# 1inch API Documentation - llms.txt

## Authentication
- [Authentication](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/apis/authentication): Learn how to authenticate API requests using API keys.

## Core APIs
- [Overview](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/overview): Comprehensive guides for integrating with 1inch APIs and protocols.
- [Swap APIs](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/apis/swap/introduction): Execute token swaps.
- [Orderbook API](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/apis/orderbook/introduction): Access the 1inch orderbook.
- [History API](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/apis/history/introduction): Access transaction history data across major blockchain networks.
- [Traces API](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/apis/traces/introduction): Get transaction traces.
- [Portfolio API](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/apis/portfolio/introduction): Track your DeFi portfolio.
- [Balance API](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/apis/balance/introduction): Real-time token balance tracking across multiple blockchain networks.
- [Gas Price API](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/apis/gas-price/introduction): Get real-time gas prices.
- [Spot Price API](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/apis/spot-price/introduction): Get real-time spot prices for tokens.
- [Token API](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/apis/tokens/introduction): Get information about tokens.
- [NFT API](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/apis/nft/introduction): Get information about NFTs.
- [Transaction Gateway API](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/apis/transaction/introduction): Secure on-chain transaction broadcasting.
- [Web3 RPC API](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/apis/web3-rpc/introduction): Access the 1inch Web3 RPC.
- [Charts API](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/apis/charts/introduction): Get data for charts.
- [Domains API](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/apis/domains/introduction): Resolve domain names.
- [Token Details API](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/apis/token-details/introduction): Get detailed information about tokens.

## Contracts
- [Aggregation Protocol](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/contracts/aggregation-protocol/aggregation-introduction): Interact with the 1inch Aggregation Protocol.
- [Limit Order Protocol](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/contracts/limit-order-protocol/limit-order-introduction): Interact with the 1inch Limit Order Protocol.
- [Spot Price Aggregator](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/contracts/spot-price-aggregator/spot-price-aggregator-introduction): Interact with the 1inch Spot Price Aggregator.

## SDKs
# No SDKs found in the documentation.

## Examples
# No examples found in the documentation.

## Rate Limiting & Error Handling
- [FAQ](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/faq/general): Find answers to common integration questions for 1inch API.
- [Becoming a Resolver](https://portal.1inch.dev/documentation/becoming-a-resolver): Information on becoming a resolver.
